DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of intravenous magnesium on blood pressure after Trendelenburg position during robot assisted prostatectomy. The secondary purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of intravenous magnesium on pain after robot assisted prostatectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intravenous Magnesium During Robot Assisted Prostatectomy
